item.title: Havaiana
item.description: unknown track os alquimistas estão chegando os alquimistas - jorge ben jor tudo que voce podia ser - quarteto em cy mina maniera - emma salokoski ensemble parabens - marcos valle ponta de lança africano (umbabarauma) - jorge ben jor olhos coloridos - sandra de sá bananeira - emilio santiago cores - da lata unknown track bahia beats - dj fidelity unknown track aguas de marco - antonio carlos jobim for full tracklist email: lampris.guttatus@gmail.com http://moonfish.podomatic.com *email for old podcasts*

item.title: 'Ole Kū Kahi
item.description: over - portishead roscoe - midlake (wizard's sleeve remix) light patterns - bonobo iron man - fourt tet i see trouble - jose gonzalez ghostwriter - rjd2 better change your mind - michael onyeabor walk on guilded splinters - dr john hercules - aaron neville bitter & twisted - the limp twins

item.title: 스물 둘
item.description: the dub that sank my sub - the limp twins toner - cornelius earthquake weather - beck bicicleta - adron (chris devoe remix) the old spot - clutchy hopkins let us be loving - alice russell beauty - ben westbeech un graso de areia - the clarke-bokand big band inhaler - slide five rosa - tosca orange moon - erykah badu

item.title: Grunts....
item.description: put on your mama - riton ain't hip to be labeled a hippie - de la soul HI 808 - blue scholars the bay - lyrics born handful of dust - gfe the pimp stroll - big pimp jones kids - mgmt gronlandic edit - of montreal soul power - marschmellows one note brown - new mastersounds get innocuous! - lcd soundsystem muscle cars - mylo did i do wrong - clara hill & king britt http://moonfish.podomatic.com

item.title: 25 north
item.description: talk on indolence - the avett brothers car carrier blues - leo kottke and mike gordon kidney in a cooler - keller williams roll um easy - little feat new madrid - uncle tupelo corrina - taj mahal clean up your own backyard - elvis presley bloodhound - the big wu black clouds - the string cheese incident roll in my sweet baby's arms - bill monroe and the bluegrass boys 40 miles from denver - yonder mountain string band midnight moonlight - old & in the way jolene - dolly parton up on the hill where they do the boogie - john hartford band (3/27/83) green river - m.ward get along without me know - riely oconnor the ballad of curtis lowe - lynyrd skynyrd willin' - the byrds eight cylinders - yonder mountain string band weight of lies - the avett brothers my baby's gone - jeff austin and chris castino

item.title: Terrible Twos
item.description: two years of opah's ono tunes old enough to start talking back ... so watch out this year. spacefruit - the SA RA creative partners groovin' - kero one endangered species (raeo mix) - nickodemus sun people - nickodemus sunroof - people under the stairs dat's cool - dj unknown face 28 butts - little jackie blame it on the boogie - the jacksons
item.dc:creator: Opah
item.itunes:summary:
two years of opah's ono tunes old enough to start talking back ... so watch out this year.
spacefruit - the SA RA creative partners groovin' - kero one endangered species (raeo mix) - nickodemus sun people - nickodemus sunroof - people under the stairs dat's cool - dj unknown face 28 butts - little jackie blame it on the boogie - the jacksons

item.title: Songs for an Equinox
item.description: ~ - - - - - - - - ~ intro – sigur ros flyin’ on 747 – kid loco melancholia – 40 winks schooled in the trade – people under the stairs remembrance – caia eternal caravan of reincarnation – santana esclavo triste – marc ribot lundu – susana baca el mayoral – lucila campos la comadre cocoliche – arturo ‘zambo’ cavero strings of life – christian prommer’s drum lesson pacific vibrations – sound providers splattatorium – the pharcyde real eyes – madlib (feat. quasimoto) check the blueprints – kero one blue school – blue scholars fresh mode – ugly duckling on & on (jungle remix) – erykah badu ~ - - - - - - - - ~

item.title: Ox
item.description: low and lazy ... welcome the ox bubble drop - jumbonics yeah - olive oil up jumped spring - jacob fred jazz odyssey father - the quantic soul orchestra frogs in tuxes - podington bear taming the shrew - skerik's syncopated taint septet shadows - kobayashi love of a woman - clutchy hopkins (feat. darondo) go to hell, mr. bush - skerik's syncopated taint septet

item.title: A Little Slow
item.description: na mele pupū crosseyed & painless - talking heads ego trippin' at the gates of hell - the flaming lips way over yonder in the minor key - billy bragg and wilco willie - cat power last tide - sun kil moon floating - sun kil moon lay and love - bonnie 'prince' billie sunset soon forgotten - iron and wine moving pictures, silent pictures - great lake swimmers if you're feeling sinister - belle and sebastian tones of home - blind melon
item.dc:creator: Opah
item.itunes:summary:
na mele pupū
crosseyed & painless - talking heads ego trippin' at the gates of hell - the flaming lips way over yonder in the minor key - billy bragg and wilco willie - cat power last tide - sun kil moon floating - sun kil moon lay and love - bonnie 'prince' billie sunset soon forgotten - iron and wine moving pictures, silent pictures - great lake swimmers if you're feeling sinister - belle and sebastian tones of home - blind melon
